hero.title: Hi, I'm {{name}}
hero.description: I specialize in building responsive, accessible, and visually polished web and mobile apps using React, Vue, Flutter, Supabase, and Hi-send. From wireframes to pixel-perfect UIs, I bridge the gap between design and functional beauty.

about.title: About Me
about.description1: I'm a frontend developer who values clean interfaces, meaningful interactions, and thoughtful user experiences. I focus on turning creative ideas into functional, accessible, and visually compelling digital products. I pay strong attention to detail, visual harmony, and intuitive user flow in every build.
about.description2: I come from a background in communications, which means I think deeply about how users interact, perceive, and experience digital products. This helps me write cleaner interfaces, meaningful microcopy, and build with empathy.
about.description3: Whether it's designing clean UIs, integrating APIs, or building full-stack platforms with tools like Supabase or Hi-send, I enjoy turning ideas into real, user-focused products. I'm especially interested in frontend performance, accessibility, and beautiful transitions.
about.funFact: Here's a fun fact; I can spot misaligned buttons from 3 meters awayðŸ¤ª.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: Have a project in mind, a question, or just want to say hello? I'd love to hear from you.

success.title: Thank you for reaching out!
success.description: I'll get back to you soon.
